version_description:
!!! Warning !Update this version will delete the old save Game progress!
v1.6：

New alliance function
New restoration of colonies
35 new warlords / countries
45 new cities have been added
New conch International Federation
Fixed a large number of attack invalid bugs
Fixed AI repeat attack bug
Expanded the range of transport movement
Other optimizations and adjustments

* Thank you for support and evaluation
* We will continue to make efforts doing better

!!! Warning !Update this version will delete the old save Game progress!

Other optimizations and adjustments

!!! Warning: Update this version will delete the old save progress!
v1.7：

> New random game mode
> New military orders: regional recruitment, army concentrate
> New "P": fast positioning command City and regional location
> New player city information signs: green dot recruitment, red dot - regional army buildup point.
> 10 new cities
> Fix the smuggling of armaments BUG
> Fix the monthly execution BUG caused by the empty set data
> Other optimization and adjustment

* Thank you for support and evaluation
* We will continue to make efforts doing better

#Warning：Update this version will delete the old save progress!
#Language display Error after update: Try removing the game APP and then downloading it again
v1.8：

> Cancelled the Alliance of Random Mode
> New "Co" button: Show current map area color
> New "Ci" button: Fast switch all cities
> New Region : 1, New City : 12
> Fix the BUG after the troops move
> Fix the BUG that stops during the AI execution policy
> Fix the BUG about city concentrate and city alliance
> Other optimization and adjustment

* Thank you for support and evaluation
* We will continue to make efforts doing better

# Update this version will delete the old save progress!
v1.9：
> Fixed a bug where the city disappeared
> Fixed a huge number of attack invalid bugs
> New Region: 5, New City: 98
> New observation mode
> New Three Game archive
> New, new player tutorial
> Optimized for color in some areas
> Adjusted the number of armaments in some regions of the historical mode
> Other optimization and adjustment

* Thank you for support and evaluation
* We will continue to make efforts doing better

# Update this version will delete the old save progress!
v2.0：

> Fixed frequent crash Bug
> Fixed diplomatic relations in some regions
> Fixed regional recovery and concentrate
> New affiliate Invitation feature
> New background music
> New regions: 6 , New cities: 33
> Optimized AI and some interface
> Optimized partial translation (grateful for all the help)
> Other optimization and adjustment

* Thank you for support and evaluation
* Will continue to make efforts doing better

# Upgrade this version will delete the old save progress!
v2.1：
> Improved the armaments system
> New Arms technology Trading
> New 7 country's classic rifle series
> New regions: 4, Cities: 10
> Adjusted the city interface
> Increased the power of tanks and navies.
> Fixed an invalid attack BUG
> Other optimization and adjustment

* Thank you for support and evaluation
* Will continue to make efforts doing better

# Update this version will delete the old game archive!
v2.2：

> Added classic Tank series in 6 countries
> New regions: 9, New cities: 52
> New historical Event System
> The old policy system was renamed the economy system
> Reduced the city's defenses.
> Increased the price of weapons (closer to historical time)
> Increased initial warship level
> Fixed the rifle could not be upgraded and purchased
> Other optimization and adjustment

* Thank you for support and evaluation
* Will continue to make efforts doing better

# Update this version will delete the old game archive!
v2.3：

> New regions: 3, new cities: 29
> New classic Fighter series (x6).
> New Hot Seat Mode.
> New economic status information.
> Adjusted the initial warplane level.
> Optimized the city's defense system.
> Fixed bugs that failed to attack the city
> Fix bugs that have disappeared from the army.
> Fixes Bug for translation errors and inability to select a country or region.
> Fixed a crash Bug in using a widescreen phone.
> Other optimization and adjustment.

* Thank you for support and evaluation
* Will continue to make efforts doing better

# Update this version will delete the old game archive!
v2.4：

> Added main historical events from 1914 to 1938
> New Classic Weapon Series x1
> New regions: 5 (+46), New cities: 53
> Increased initial industrial values in some cities
> Increased minimum industrial values for the production of armaments
> Fixes errors where AI's weapons are upgraded too quickly
> Fixes errors where players disappear in Hot Seat mode
> New historical map option in Hot Seat mode
> Other optimizations and adjustments

* Thank you for support and evaluation
* Will continue to make efforts doing better

v2.5.0：
# Game archive will be deleted after upgrade !!

> New classic aircraft carrier series and construction system
> New city: 11 ,Regions: 15
> Limits the range of land and air forces leaving the city
> Enhanced artificial intelligence
> Reduced speed of warship production
> Reduced attack power of military transport
> Other improvements and fixes

* Thank you for support and evaluation
* Will continue to make efforts doing better
